user_query: I am planning a trip to Europe with my family and I need to keep track of the economic calendar for the countries we will be visiting. Please provide me with the economic calendar for the date range from October 1st to October 15th, 2023, and include the countries France, Italy, and Spain. Additionally, I would like to get suggestions for popular stocks, forex, and cryptocurrency in these countries to explore investment opportunities. Finally, could you also check the balance of my Zilliqa wallet with the address zil15lr86jwg937urdeayvtypvhy6pnp6d7p8n5z09?

TaskList.description: Fetch the economic calendar for France, Italy, and Spain for the date range from October 1st to October 15th, 2023.
Retrieve suggestions for popular stocks, forex, and cryptocurrency in France, Italy, and Spain.
Check the balance of Zilliqa wallet for the provided address.
